name: Link Sudantha Toothpaste
short_description: The only clinically proven toothpaste to destroy
description:
The only clinically proven toothpaste in Sri Lanka.
The Link Sudantha toothpaste has been formulated with the idea of presenting the benefits from a mixture of medicinal plants which have been used in Ayurveda for keeping teeth and gums healthy. It uses a total extract of nine specially selected plant species to formulate a regular modern herbal toothpaste. Based on the findings of the clinical trials conducted at The Faculty of Dental Sciences, University of Peradeniya, Sudantha destroys harmful bacteria & prevents formation of plaque.             Bad bacteria is the main cause of common oral problems. Sudantha is clinically proven to destroy bad bacteria which prevents dental caries and gum diseases. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
